name: Cooktop
description:
Cooktop

Start your own culinary venture in this game where you begin with a small cooking business, selling ingredients to earn money and upgrade your kitchen equipment. Expand your cooking skills and grow your business to become a top

While the end of the game's development is undoubtedly disappointing, there is still a chance that the dreams of the team and fans could come to life. With the possibility of surveys being conducted to gauge interest and a potential teaser in the event of a comeback, it's clear that the company hasn't entirely closed the door on the game's future. We can only hope that the passion and creativity that went into the project will be recognized and that the game may make its triumphant return in the future.
